scripts.build:sprite-icons-components: cross-var rimraf src/components/$npm_config_directory && cross-var svgr -d src/components/$npm_config_directory svgs-fixed/$npm_config_directory --config-file templates/.svgrrc-sprite.js
scripts.fix:icons: cross-var rimraf svgs-fixed/interface-icons-system && cross-var rimraf svgs-fixed/interface-icons-product && ts-node scripts/fixIcons.ts
scripts.build:services-icons: rimraf src/components/services-icons && svgr -d src/components/services-icons svgs/inherit/services --config-file templates/.svgrrc.js
scripts.build:extension-icons: rimraf src/components/extension-icons && svgr -d src/components/extension-icons svgs/inherit/extension --config-file templates/.svgrrc.js
scripts.build:display-icons: rimraf src/components/display-icons && svgr -d src/components/display-icons svgs/inherit/display --config-file templates/.svgrrc.js
scripts.build:interface-icons-old: rimraf src/components/interface-icons-old && svgr -d src/components/interface-icons-old svgs/inherit/interface-old --config-file templates/.svgrrc.js
scripts.build:logo-icons: rimraf src/components/logo-icons && svgr --config-file templates/.svgrrc-color.js -d src/components/logo-icons svgs/color/logos
scripts.build:platform-icons: rimraf src/components/platform-icons && svgr --config-file templates/.svgrrc-platform.js -d src/components/platform-icons svgs/color/platform
scripts.build:avatarPlaceholder-icons: rimraf src/components/avatarPlaceholder-icons && svgr -d src/components/avatarPlaceholder-icons svgs/inherit/avatarPlaceholder --config-file templates/.svgrrc.js
scripts.build:color-icons: rimraf src/components/color-icons && svgr --config-file templates/.svgrrc-color.js -d src/components/color-icons svgs/color/other
scripts.build:sprite-icons: npm run validate:icons && npm run fix:icons && npm run build:sprite-icons-all && npm run create-export-index-file && npm run create-sprite
scripts.build:svgs-illustrations: npm run build:illustrations-evolution-icons && npm run build:illustrations-platforms-icons
scripts.build:svgs-color: npm run build:color-icons && npm run build:logo-icons && npm run build:platform-icons
scripts.build:svgs-inherit: npm run build:extension-icons && npm run build:services-icons && npm run build:display-icons && npm run build:interface-icons-old && npm run build:avatarPlaceholder-icons
scripts.compile: npm run build:svgs-inherit && npm run build:svgs-color && npm run build:svgs-illustrations && npm run build:sprite-icons
